name: popasmear
text: This strip is a miracle.

name: flynn
text: This strip cures cancer.

name: catgrl131
text: A comment left by catgrl131 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, BPMead, fancypants, ConnorMc, Brosaurus, whymog)

text: A comment left by boopy was marked lame too many times and excluded. name: soticoto
text: Chuck Norris laughs at your suffering.

name: dans
text: Christ.

name: zaer
text: Yes, Christ does that too.

name: cracklewater
text: A comment left by cracklewater was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Severide, furysama, ActualTaunt, CanusDivinus, AtlanticCity)

name: nessotron
text: I am ... I am

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, biomusicologist, Sakana, re5urgam, magnumt, SoManyWhales, Talbain, michellemarie, LaserBlade, Magb, TheSoulBear, bixschmix, alejandroadam, usversusthem, retinarow, AtlanticCity, dropkickpikachu, stoned_lightning, Darthemed)

name: gormster
text: A comment left by gormster was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, BPMead, Jhunter, VictoriaW)

name: carlyle
text: Man I could've sworn that said circumscribed, but I just assumed that bacause it's hall late.

name: pascal
text: I don't think that I've ever been so blue that dressing up like cowboys with a naive otter wouldn't cheer me up. You are rad Philippe.

name: magnumt
text: Philippe is truly a rad friend.

name: spinynorman
text: he is rad as the dickens

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray is very good at cheering people up. He tells them they are rad.

name: lordhumungus
text: I think I'd feel pretty damn good if Ray told me I was rad.

name: geysershitdick
text: This strip...is...rad!

name: snowman
text: The rad thing to say... ever!

name: varnish
text:
You mean the rad that I... boned?

Wait, wait, no. Damn it!

name: lukef
text: This is my favourtite strip hands down.

name: crinklebat
text: A comment left by crinklebat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by re5urgam, molesticide, aHatOfPig, Boredom_Man, lastlarf, blarghamagarky)

name: andrew_
text: my former friend didn't get this one at all.

name: choosebro
text: Is he now former because of the not-getting?

name: cdl146
text: Alt text: I am going to Las Vegas for a week.

name: gussiejives
text: There is something oddly adorable of Philippe in a cowboy hat.

name: windfish
text: There is something oddly adorable about Philippe in general.

name: evolume
text:
But Ray! Cowboys!

hahahahahaha

name: afkpuz
text: He issues this line with such a sense of urgency.

name: cousinted
text: Philippe is rad

name: joeyramoney
text: aah, the tiny arms era.

name: f1shst1ck
text: Cowboys!

name: baryonyx
text: Possibly the most oft-repeated phrase to emerge from Achewood thus far.

name: tbtabby
text: It's been said before, but for real this time...THIS is the saddest thing.

name: mr_lostman28
text: you mispelled "raddest"

name: stop
text: I like how "dressing up like cowboys" involves only hats - no shirts or hand-held props. Perhaps there are also boots that fail to appear in the frame.

name: heccibiggs
text: A neckerchief would make all the difference.

name: unsentletter
text: Oh!  So sad!  Don't stop trying, Phillipe!!

name: siolre
text:
This strip got me into Achewood.


It is the raddest strip.

name: justa
text: Little dude is just so damn crushed by the idea of an emotional state that can't be cured by cowboys.

name: steerpike66
text:
This is terrible. Philippe now knows that cowboys can't save things.

America, you have turned a corner and the abyss yawns.

name: life_is_good
text: i now sign all thank you notes with "you. are. rad." it pleases me

name: mulisha7
text: Next time I'm drunk as a sailor on shore leave I'm just going to start hugging people while whispering emphatically "You...are...rad!"

name: baryonyx
text: I told my friend she was rad when she was feeling down. She looked at me funny.

name: mercuri0us
text: Maybe she thought you were coming onto her.

name: spaceandrew
text: The same thing keeps happening to me! It is something that occurs often!

name: mr_lostman28
text: What's this odd warm fuzzy feeling permeating my psyche?

name: mercuri0us
text: If everyone was a little more like Phillipe, the world would be a much radder place.

name: robot_satan
text: Frequently, when smeone disagrees with me, I say, "But (insert person's name here), Cowboys!", but they usually don't get it.  I wish I knew more people who read Achewood.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I've found myself using another line from the strip in similar situations: "They let atheletes wear leg warmers!" in a kind of argumentative tone.

It gets the same response.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
maybe I should stop saying "ath-e-letes"

maybe that would help

name: mikeronomicon
text: Philipe makes me feel warm and fuzzy inside.

name: koolmoedee
text: The haphazard tilt of Ray's hat in the third and fourth panels is what really makes this one for me.

name: dtilove
text: Aww...poor Philippe.

name: lolsworth
text: Everyone has one strip that made them realise Achewood was the best thing the human race had ever done. This one is mine.

name: bondinatowel
text: With a cowboy hat on, Phillipe looks just like Twinkie the Kid.

name: alilsneaky
text:
Don't know why but I read the first panel as 'butt ray', with the 'butt party' strip still fresh in mind.
I'm embarrased to say I was giggling

name: giltron
text: A rare intimate moment shared due to the loss of a friend. and undoubtedly a few drinks.
